meanings.sent1: The police arrested two murderesses for the crime.
meanings.sent2: The town was shocked to discover the identity of the murderesses.
meanings.sent3: The murderesses tried to blame the crime on a mischievous cat.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley whispered secrets of the murderesses' deeds.
meanings.sent5: The courtroom was filled with whispers of the murderesses' sinister plans.

meanings.sent1: The newspaper reported on the capture of the murderesses.
meanings.sent2: The book detailed the history of the infamous murderesses.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone dressed up as murderesses for fun.
meanings.sent4: The shadows in the forest seemed to dance like murderesses in the night.
meanings.sent5: The old mansion was rumored to be haunted by the spirits of the murderesses.
